content: I'm sorry if I'm being impatient about this review, but could it be possible to get a set of eyes on the PR again? We're adding the definition of the symplectic group, and I think we've addressed all of the reviewer comments... Except a little issue with a simp attribute on one of the lemmas (related to the #general > Confused about simp_nf linter thread). The PR may have fallen through the cracks between the many commits trying to fix the various issues, so I figured I would bring it up again in this stream.
@Matej Penciak Thanks for the ping. (Pinging on zulip is explicitly encouraged if your PR has been sitting on the queue for some time.)
Thank you! My first mathlib PR is merged! :tada::tada:
